message: I'm offering you a fair deal to start. Let's work together and both get a good share of the money.
You're being too generous, I'll take the majority of the money now.
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to take a smaller share than in round 1, but I need to get at least 600k to make this worthwhile.
You're still holding out for too much. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but you need to meet me halfway.
